<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1263211_pro_bono.only_one_user_linked_to_one_record</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>only_one_user_linked_to_one_record</name><script><![CDATA[var only_one_user_linked_to_one_record = Class.create();
only_one_user_linked_to_one_record.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	one_to_one:function(){
		var sys_Id=this.getParameter('id');
		
		var gr=new GlideRecord('x_1263211_pro_bono_timekeeper_register');
		gr.addQuery('user',sys_Id);
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next()){
			return 'true';
		}
		else{
			return false;
		}
	},
    type: 'only_one_user_linked_to_one_record'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-08 07:08:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>2e5a65739315021074347af08bba10e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>only_one_user_linked_to_one_record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Pro Bono Opportunity" source="x_1263211_pro_bono">75e775f9930d021074347af08bba1054</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Pro Bono Opportunity">75e775f9930d021074347af08bba1054</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2e5a65739315021074347af08bba10e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-08 07:52:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
